Sequence Information.Peptide Name: PsDef1 (P. sylvestris defensin 1, natural AMPs; UCSS1a; 4S=S,  plants)

Literature Information.Literature: Chemical modification:  Predicted 4 disulfide bonds arebetween residues 36-82, 47-67, 53-76, and 57-78.Activity: Active against fungi (B. cinerea IC50=0.4 ug/ml; F. oxysporum, 2.9; F. solani, 0.9; H. annosum 1.4 ug/ml), moderate activity against C. albicans and T. reesei. Activity against bacteria Gram+ B. pumilus (IC50 16.2 uM), Gram-  P. carotovorum (IC50 10.8 uM), and P. carotovorum (IC50 20.4 uM). The peptide also inhibits alpha-amylases from human saliva. Updated 12/2014; 12/2017 GW.
Literature Information.Author: Kovaleva V, Kiyamova R, Cramer R, Krynytskyy H, Gout I, Filonenko V, Gout R.2009
Literature Information.Title: Purification and molecular cloning of antimicrobial peptides from Scots pine seedlings.
